verses.roman:
āra eka śuna tāṅra kṛpāra mahimā
adhama jīvere caḍhāila ūrdhva-sīmā

synonyms: āra—another; eka—one; śuna—please hear; tāṅra kṛpāra mahimā—glory of His mercy; adhama jīvere—the downtrodden living being; caḍhāila—He elevated; ūrdhva-sīmā—to the topmost limit.
translation: Please listen to another glory of His mercy. He made a fallen living entity climb to the highest limit.
